name: Illumi-Naughty ;) REMASTERED
description:
you are tasked with infiltrating the illumi-headquarters and messing them up big time. or something. #420BLAZEM'

A 2D shooter/action game with RPG elements! shoot your way through the illuminati headquarters and save the world from this evil doing corporation!

this version is currently only in beta! only chapter one is complete! please check back regularly for updates, or follow me on twitter @FruitPunk

any and all feedback is greatly appreciated! if there is a way you think i can improve the experience, please, let me know!

as the title implies, this is a remake. you can play the original here: https://www.newgrounds.com/portal/view/675006

OR the sequel here! https://punkfruit.itch.io/illuminaughty2
